texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: On a Plesk server, the maximum size for an individual e-mail sent through qmail is unlimited. You can limit this size by adding a number to the /var/qmail/control/databytes file.
texts.text: On a Plesk server, the maximum size for an individual e-mail sent through qmail is unlimited. You can limit this size by adding a number to the /var/qmail/control/databytes file.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you wanted to limit this to something like 10MB, you can just run the following command:
texts.text: If you wanted to limit this to something like 10MB, you can just run the following command:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This will limit the size of messages (including attachments) to 10MB as a maximum.
texts.text: This will limit the size of messages (including attachments) to 10MB as a maximum.
